this is my favourite game of all time i love this game so much it is so peaceful and relaxing i didnt think i would like it when i first opened the game as ive never tried a climbing game before but the storyline is beautiful and the scenery is beautiful if you take your time and look around and not rush up every single climb experience it and remember to enjoy the game it is not short at all

jusant is a wonderful game great sound design great soundtrack and great visuals would class it as a cozy sort of game youll fight no monsters youll craft no weapons and youll not need to manage any resources outside stamina during climbing sections could finish it in an afternoon at about 5 hours if your not trying to unlock everything a simple idea done very well and worth the time you invest in playing it would recommend
